param.name: nbPlugEnabled
param.label: NinjaBoard Plugin Enabled
param.description: Specify Yes to enable NinjaBoard plugin.

param.name: nbPlugShowSubject
param.label: Show Subject
param.description: Specify Yes to to show the Subject.

param.name: nbPlugTruncateSubject
param.label: Subject Max Length
param.description: Specify the number of characters to truncate the subject to.

param.name: nbPlugShowMessage
param.label: Show Message
param.description: Specify Yes to to show the Message.

param.name: nbPlugTruncateMessage
param.label: Message Max Length
param.description: Specify the number of characters to truncate the message to.

param.name: nbPlugShowForum
param.label: Show Forum
param.description: Specify Yes to to show the forum that the post is in.

param.name: nbPlugShowHits
param.label: Show Hits
param.description: Specify Yes to to show the number of hits that the parent topic of the post has recieved.

param.name: nbPlugShowCreated
param.label: Show Created Date
param.description: Specify Yes to to show the date and time that the post was created.

param.name: nbPlugShowModified
param.label: Show Modified Date
param.description: Specify Yes to to show the date and time that the post was last modified if one exists.

param.name: nbPlugShowEdit
param.label: Show View Link
param.description: Specify Yes to to show the edit link that will take the user to the post edit form.

param.name: nbPlugDateFormat
param.label: Date Format
param.description: Specify the format dates will be shown in.

param.name: nbPlugSortBy
param.label: Sort By
param.description: Specify how you would like the posts to be sorted.

param.name: nbPlugSortOrder
param.label: Sort Order
param.description: Specify if you would like the posts to be sorted in Ascending order or Descending order.

param.name: nbPlugPaginationCount
param.label: Posts Limit
param.description: Limit the number of posts to show, if paging is on then multiple pages of the set number will be shown, if paging is off only one page of the set number will be shown.

param.name: nbPlugShowPagination
param.label: Show Paging
param.description: Show paging for posts if the number of posts exceeds the posts limit.

tab.name: NinjaBoard
tab.description: This tab allows users to view their NinjaBoard Forum Posts
